name: The Donald Trump Dating Simulator from Hell
name_original: The Donald Trump Dating Simulator from Hell
description: Have you ever wanted to date a balding billionaire future president? No? Well, here's your chance to do it anyway! You are Nicole News, and it is your job to conduct an interview with The Donald. Will you be FIRED or find love? There are 2 different endings to be found, love with The Donald or...you'll find out!
